price: Nítorí náà, ṣé wọn kò níí ronú pìwàdà sọ́dọ̀ Allāhu, kí wọ́n sì tọrọ àforíjìn lọ́dọ̀ Rẹ̀? Allāhu sì ni Aláforíjìn, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run.
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَهُۥۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yatūbūna ilā al-lahi wayastaghfirūnahu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
